meanings.english_definition: Abnormal softening of the myocardium (heart muscle).

examples.sentence: Cardiomyomalacia can be a consequence of various heart conditions.
examples.translation: 心筋軟化症は、さまざまな心臓疾患の結果として起こりうる。

etymology.value: From cardio- (relating to the heart) + myo- (muscle) + malacia (softening).
